[center]Hey want a unique custom server well this one is for you[/center] [center] ALL SKILLS WORKING GE IS PLAYER BASED LOWER EXP RATE DBL EXP ON THE WEEKENDS ECO BASED SERVER PVP/BOSSING CUSTOM MINI GAMES CUSTOM BOSSES CUSTOM HOME AREAS DONATOR ZONE IN SPACE PERSONAL PLAYER SHOPS BUY BETTER GRAVE STONES AND MUCH MORE [/center]

item.dc:creator: @kaxman kaxman
item.description:
@kaxman wrote:

Not seeing anywhere that someone claims anything hard, think theyâre just informing others when theyâve added and or fixed anything, better then bump bump bumpâ¦anyway really nice server, and great bunchâ¦even though xp is lower, the scrolls, caskets, and keys make up for it, got all kinds of kewl gear already and double xp on weekends is sweet. Anyone saying not unique should stick there head in and really check it, owners have tried really hard to but their own touches on game.

Read full topic

item.title: Returnscape 718 A place where players may gather, relax, and just have fun (NEW)
item.dc:creator: @hollynye hollynye
item.description:
@hollynye wrote:

Here is a list of the latest updates

  1. fixed the avator of destructions hp that boss has a 12 hp now 6500

  2. added the drop tables fo rthe baby dragons and red dragons

  3. added charm drops to most of the slayer monsters and non slayer monsters

  4. fixed glaciors so they wont drop rare items every single death

  5. fixed dark beasts combat

  6. fixed silk prices and bird snare prices

  7. fixed wildywyrms only dropping 1gp and added other things for them to drop

Read full topic
